descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription

toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

include_count
options.description: Whether to include the number of users in each User Group

returnAll.name: returnAll

filters.name: filters

options.name: channelId
options.description: Channel containing the file to be listed. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: showFilesHidden
options.description: Whether to show truncated file info for files hidden due to being too old, and the team who owns the file being over the file limit

options.name: tsFrom
options.description: Filter files created after this timestamp (inclusive)

options.name: tsTo
options.description: Filter files created before this timestamp (inclusive)

options.name: types
options.description: Filter files by type

options.name: userId
options.description: Filter files created by a single user. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: Whether to resolve the data automatically. By default the response only contain the ID to resource.

name.name: name
name.description: A name for the User Group. Must be unique among User Groups.

ts.name: ts

messageType.name: messageType
messageType.description: Whether to send a simple text message, or use Slack’s Blocks UI builder for more sophisticated messages that include form fields, sections and more

options.name: Simple Text Message
options.description: Supports basic Markdown

options.name: Blocks
options.description: Combine text, buttons, form elements, dividers and more in Slack 's visual builder

text.name: text
text.description: The message text to update. Supports markdown by default - this can be disabled in "Options".
text.ai_hint: The message text to update. Supports markdown by default - this can be disabled in "Options".

blocksUi.name: blocksUi
blocksUi.description: Enter the JSON output from Slack's visual Block Kit Builder here. You can then use expressions to add variable content to your blocks. To create blocks, use Slack's Block Kit Builder
blocksUi.hint: To create blocks, use Slack's Block Kit Builder
blocksUi.ai_hint: Enter the JSON output from Slack's visual Block Kit Builder here. You can then use expressions to add variable content to your blocks. To create blocks, use Slack's Block Kit Builder

options.name: author_icon
options.description: Icon which should appear for the user

options.name: footer

options.name: footer_icon

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields to add to message

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: channels
options.description: A comma-separated string of encoded channel IDs for which the User Group uses as a default. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: description
options.description: A short description of the User Group

options.name: handle
options.description: A mention handle. Must be unique among channels, users and User Groups.

options.name: include_count
options.description: Whether to include the number of users in each User Group

options.name: name
options.description: A name for the User Group. Must be unique among User Groups.

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

formFields.name: formFields

values.name: fieldLabel
values.description: Label that appears above the input field

values.name: fieldName
values.description: The name of the field, used in input attributes and referenced by the workflow

values.name: fieldType
values.description: The type of field to add to the form

values.name: elementName
values.description: Optional field. It can be used to include the html in the output.

values.name: placeholder
values.description: Sample text to display inside the field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-filled in the form field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default date value that will be pre-filled in the form field (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-selected. Must match one of the option labels.

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value(s) that will be pre-selected. Must match one or multiple of the option labels. Separate multiple pre-selected options with a comma.

values.name: fieldValue
values.description: Input value can be set here or will be passed as a query parameter via Field Name if no value is set

values.name: fieldOptions
values.description: List of options that can be selected from the dropdown

values.displayName: Multiple Choice is a legacy option, please use Checkboxes or Radio Buttons field type instead
values.name: multiselectLegacyNotice
multiselect
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple options from the dropdown list

values.name: html
values.description: HTML elements to display on the form page

values.name: multipleFiles
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple files from the file input or just one

values.name: acceptFileTypes
values.description: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions
values.hint: Leave empty to allow all file types

values.displayName: The displayed date is formatted based on the locale of the user's browser
values.name: formatDate
requiredField
values.description: Whether to require the user to enter a value for this field before submitting the form

formFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'archive' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'close' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelVisibility'
IF operation == 'invite' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'invite' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'userIds'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'kick' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'kick' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF operation == 'join' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'history' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'history' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'history' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'history' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'leave' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'member' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'member' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'member' AND resource == 'channel' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'member' THEN SHOW parameter 'resolveData'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'open' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'rename' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'rename' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'replies' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'replies' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'ts'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'replies' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'replies' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'channel' AND operation == 'replies' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'setPurpose' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'setPurpose' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'purpose'
IF operation == 'setTopic' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'setTopic' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'topic'
IF operation == 'unarchive' AND resource == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getPermalink' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getPermalink' THEN SHOW parameter 'timestamp'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'post' THEN SHOW parameter 'select'
IF operation == 'post' AND resource == 'message' AND select == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'post' AND resource == 'message' AND select == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF operation == 'post' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageType'
IF operation == 'post' AND resource == 'message' AND messageType == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'post' AND resource == 'message' AND messageType == 'block' THEN SHOW parameter 'blocksUi'
IF operation == 'post' AND resource == 'message' AND messageType == 'block' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'post' AND resource == 'message' AND messageType == 'attachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'noticeAttachments'
IF operation == 'post' AND resource == 'message' AND messageType == 'attachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachments'
IF operation == 'post' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'otherOptions'
IF profilePhotoType == 'emoji' THEN SHOW parameter 'icon_emoji'
IF profilePhotoType == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'icon_url'
IF /select == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'ephemeral'
IF /select == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'ephemeral'
IF /authentication == 'accessToken' THEN SHOW parameter 'sendAsUser'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'ts'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageType'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'message' AND messageType == 'block' THEN SHOW parameter 'blocksUi'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'message' AND messageType == 'block' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' AND messageType == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'otherOptions'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'select'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'message' AND select == 'channel' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'message' AND select == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'timestamp'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'query'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'sort'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'search' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'select'
IF select == 'channel' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF select == 'user' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'responseType'
IF responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'defineForm'
IF defineForm == 'json' AND responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonOutput'
IF defineForm == 'fields' AND responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'formFields'
IF fieldType IN ["hiddenField", "html"] THEN HIDE parameter 'fieldLabel'
IF fieldType == 'hiddenField' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldName'
IF fieldType == 'html' THEN SHOW parameter 'elementName'
IF fieldType IN ["dropdown", "date", "file", "html", "hiddenField", "radio", "checkbox"] THEN HIDE parameter 'placeholder'
IF fieldType IN ["text", "number", "email", "textarea"] THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType IN ["dropdown", "radio"] THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'hiddenField' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldValue'
IF fieldType == 'dropdown' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF fieldType == 'radio' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF multiselect == True AND fieldType == 'dropdown' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'lt': 2.3}} THEN SHOW parameter 'multiselectLegacyNotice'
IF fieldType == 'dropdown' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'lt': 2.3}} THEN SHOW parameter 'multiselect'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'limitSelection'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'exact' THEN SHOW parameter 'numberOfSelections'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'range' THEN SHOW parameter 'minSelections'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'range' THEN SHOW parameter 'maxSelections'
IF fieldType == 'html' THEN SHOW parameter 'html'
IF fieldType == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'multipleFiles'
IF fieldType == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'acceptFileTypes'
IF fieldType == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'formatDate'
IF fieldType IN ["html", "hiddenField"] THEN HIDE parameter 'requiredField'
IF responseType == 'approval' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'approvalOptions'
IF approvalType IN ["single", "double"] THEN SHOW parameter 'approveLabel'
IF approvalType IN ["single", "double"] THEN SHOW parameter 'buttonApprovalStyle'
IF approvalType == 'double' THEN SHOW parameter 'disapproveLabel'
IF approvalType == 'double' THEN SHOW parameter 'buttonDisapprovalStyle'
IF responseType == 'approval' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF limitType == 'afterTimeInterval' THEN SHOW parameter 'resumeAmount'
IF limitType == 'afterTimeInterval' THEN SHOW parameter 'resumeUnit'
IF limitType == 'atSpecifiedTime' THEN SHOW parameter 'maxDateAndTime'
IF responseType IN ["freeText", "customForm"] AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'star' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'star' THEN SHOW parameter 'target'
IF resource == 'star' AND operation == 'add' AND target IN ["message", "file"] THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'star' AND operation == 'add' AND target == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF resource == 'star' AND operation == 'add' AND target == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'timestamp'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'star' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'star' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'star' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'star' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' AND @version IN [2, 2.1] THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryData'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' AND binaryData == False AND @version IN [2, 2.1] THEN SHOW parameter 'fileContent'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' AND binaryData == True AND @version IN [2, 2.1] THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 2.2}} THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF @version IN [2, 2.1] THEN SHOW parameter 'channelIds'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 2.2}} THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF resource == 'reaction' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'reaction' AND operation IN ["add", "get", "remove"] THEN SHOW parameter 'channelId'
IF resource == 'reaction' AND operation IN ["add", "get", "remove"] THEN SHOW parameter 'timestamp'
IF resource == 'reaction' AND operation IN ["add", "remove"] THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation IN ["info", "getProfile"] AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getPresence' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'updateProfile' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'userGroup' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'Options'
IF operation == 'disable' AND resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'userGroupId'
IF resource == 'userGroup' AND operation == 'disable' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'enable' AND resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'userGroupId'
IF resource == 'userGroup' AND operation == 'enable' THEN SHOW parameter 'option'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'userGroup' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'userGroup' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'userGroup' THEN SHOW parameter 'userGroupId'
IF resource == 'userGroup' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
